title: List some champions you don't see anymore!
body:
With 140 champions there's obviously a lot you won't see, so why don't you list some of em and maybe give a reason or 2 as to why they aren't here and what could be done to fix it.

{{champion:82}}  Believe he's just too buggy right now and could use a rework or buffs and bug fixes. https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/fLvuqJ3d-all-180-mordekaiser-bugs-ranked-by-importance-and-sorted-into-17-categories < Not sure if this is accurate right now but this listed a lot of his bugs.

{{champion:32}}  Sad mummy, his kit isn't that good if your team never cooperates or is just made up of assassins who want to solo carry. *COUGH {{champion:555}} COUGH {{champion:238}} COUGH {{champion:121}} COUGH {{champion:107}} COUGH* 

{{champion:20}} Yes he is being reworked but right now god damn. I tried playing him on PBE but every matchup he seems to be useless or maybe I just suck, dunno.

I might add more but go ahead and list your own rare champions!

A lot of these champions are still decent tho maybe even op, but they dont fit the meta so they fall to the wayside. If its not in the top meta its not worth playing. Ornn is SUPER strong but tanks arent great atm so whatever put him on a shelf

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qbWIjVeE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-07-28T11:40:56.509+0000)

The only one I'd have to disagree with is Annie, she seems to be played in mid lane a lot in my games, not supp tho :c

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qbWIjVeE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-07-28T11:13:13.490+0000)
>
> {{champion:84}} 
> 
> *cough cough*
> ######too soon?

No trust me shes so much worse you will barely even see her against players anymore.

It took me a whole year, but I saw my first {{champion:432}} in normals a week ago. 
I never saw {{champion:6}} before or after rework.
And I always wonder if people actually play {{champion:154}} anymore

I see Morde every game.  Also hes not in a bad spot since the OP class of champions that scaled better, faster & safer. Got Justly nerfed.  During that patch his playrate jumped to 5%.   Imagine a Champion with less than 1% playrate for two years   getting over a 500% increase.
There are people who want to play him, the satisfaction in playing him just isn't there with the sheer amount of BS.


It's safe to say marksmens dominance was keeping  most people away from the Champion.  
As someone who mained him for a long time I can say that the period of time between the Juggernaut update and the Marksmen Nerf (2 years) Was a very Aggravating and Depressing time.

I couldn't show my intent to pick him until after ban phase   since my own team would ban him away from me. 
(He had the Lowest ban rate for those 2 years so allied team bans must have accounted for most of the ones he did get).  

He has the Playrate of an actual Champion now.   Just fuck riot for over 2 years of hell.  The Morde mains deserved better

{{champion:101}}

Being a champion with 4 skillshots in a meta where high mobility champions are the most viable sucks gorilla pee pee.
{{champion:114}} , I used to see her a lot but now not even once.
